name: ThetaBuddy
0:
”Alexa open Theta Buddy”
”Alexa ask Theta Buddy for prices”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: theta buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des: Theta Buddy is the unofficial assistant app for Theta TV fans. With Theta Buddy you'll never miss a broadcast from one of your favorite Theta TV streamers again. Whenever a streamer you follow starts broadcasting your Alexa device will tell you to go watch the stream.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
